content.value: I can see that. But if it creates tension in the workplace, or an environment where some feel they have to keep their opinions to themselves, is that fair? Why can some speak up, but not others? And it's not necessarily even someone saying "I do this awful thing" ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
content.html: I can see that. But if it creates tension in the workplace, or an environment where some feel they have to keep their opinions to themselves, is that fair? Why can some speak up, but not others? And it's not necessarily even someone saying "I do this awful thing" ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
